strapiPost.title: Sam’s Club Planning Campus Expansion
strapiPost.content:
On Monday, Bentonville-based Sam’s Club announced plans to construct a 34,000 sq. ft. Design Studio on its corporate campus west of Moberly Ln. 

  • The why: The Sam’s Club Design Studio will be a dedicated space for innovating, creating, and collaborating, with hopes to empower the company to continue boldly into the rapidly transforming future of retail. 
  • The when: Nielsen Architecture of Bentonville will build The Design Studio with construction expected to begin in early 2023 and completion anticipated by the following spring. 

Learn more about the development HERE.
